amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director to develop recommendations regarding the placement of automatic external defibrillators in Federal buildings.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 21 printed in the Congressional Record to direct the Director to develop recommendations on the automatic external defibrillators in Federal buildings including placement, training , maintenance, medical oversight, and coordination with emergency medical services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
